full_title: No One Noticed by The Marías
title: No One Noticed

description.plain:
“No One Noticed” sees María being torn up by her lover, feeling unnoticed by him as she slowly reveals how she truly feels.

Sonically, it takes a somber tone, as María’s ever so docile and airy voice is accompanied by a low-tempo guitar beat until becoming a focal point after the mid-section crescendo, and a wobbling drum pattern in the second verse, reminiscent of her own fragile mind. The reverberations and secondary voice noted in this song, primarily in the chorus and refrain, serve to be a dichotic force in the track. This pushes the idea further that María is “unravelling” as her lover left her bitter. Deep down however, in her torn state of mind, she still desperately wants him back.

The reverberations and secondary voice noted in this song, primarily in the chorus and refrain, serve to be a dichotic force in the track. This pushes the idea further that María is “unravelling” as her lover left her bitter. Deep down however, in her torn state of mind, she still desperately wants him back.
